__e: I spoke to Wyatt, and he agreed to talk to anyone who had seen his daughter.
She saw me with Wyatt, and I don't know, she thinks we're together.
No sign of your buddy, Dr. Wyatt, and we're almost out of time.
Tell you what, why don't you and Wyatt come see me after school today and we can see if we can get those juices flowing.
No, sir, I haven't seen Wyatt in, I don't know... over a year, I don't know, closer to two.
What's so important Wyatt can't come home this weekend?
According to you, Wyatt has the woman I love.
Wyatt's got what we both want, so that's where we have to get to.
"I should've called the police as soon as Wyatt called us, but I let you talk me out of it, and if we had done what I wanted to do, then Callie would be safe right now."
